"1. Hold your phone in front of you.
2. Rotate in the direction and degrees as instructed.
3. Move your hand over the earpiece to lock guess.
"

"1. Wait for the mole to appear.
2. Whack your hand over the earpiece of the phone.
3. Don't miss!
"

"1. Try to match the volume of the top bar.
2. When the bar turns green hold that volume to fill the bottom blue bar.
3. Fill as many bars as possible.
"

"1.Hold your phone vertical and use it as a balancing board.
2. Catch as many stars you can before the times up.
3. Catching several stars in a row gives you a pointsmultiplier.
4. Touch the edges and lose your pointsmultiplier.
"
